title: Impeachment, Lamar Odom, Colin Kaepernick, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: Impeachment, Lamar Odom, Colin Kaepernick, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is working with a new level of gratitude. Tommy is back from roller coaster cuff surgery and has a messy story to tell. Impeachment hearings have begun. John Legend is People Magazine's Sexiest Man Alive. Lamar Odom is engaged. Colin Kaepernick is having a workout this Saturday in Atlanta. Sheryl Underwood is here to continue the discussion of impeachment. Will Rihanna be right back or nah? Is there such a thing as a $31 million dollar watch? Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO has a gem for you if you want better for your life, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
